Name: Crushed
About the game: Crushed â€” is an Singleplayer and Multiplayer First-Person Survival Sandbox in an Open World! Challenge the wild and be ready to survive in harsh conditions. Explore the world, get resources, cook food, build a house, farm, hunt, and enjoy nature. Features Multiplayer and Singleplayer Survive alone, or together with your friends. Crafting Items Create items, weapons and construction items using the resources you find. Building System Build your own house and equip it according to your own taste and preferences. Animals Hunt or become prey. Farming Find grains and create your own farms. Gathering Ore Mine ore, melt it in a furnace and use ingots to create items. Item Durability Your tools and weapons have a durability bar. Natural Needs Mechanics of health, stamina, thirst and hunger. Day and Night cycle. Change of time of day with atmospheric phenomena. Cooking Food Food can be grown, hunted, and cooked. Food Expiration Date Food ceases to be edible if it is not stored in the refrigerator.
